testcase.name: TC_0003 kullanici gecerli verilerle Company Seller hesabi olusturur
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "http://glbtrader.com/" sayfasindadir.......................passed And kullanici Seller Join Now butonuna tiklar..............................passed And kullanici Company Seller sekmesine tiklar...............................passed And kullanici Company Name girer............................................passed And kullanici Company Mobile girer..........................................passed And kullanici Company Address girer.........................................passed And kullanici Name girer....................................................passed And kullanici Email girer...................................................passed And kullanici Sub Domain girer..............................................passed And kullanici Mobile Number girer...........................................passed And kullanici Country dropdowndan secer.....................................passed And kullanici State girer...................................................passed And kullanici City girer....................................................passed And kullanici Address girer.................................................passed And kullanici Postal Code girer.............................................passed And kullanici Categories dropdowndan secer..................................passed And kullanici Password girer................................................passed And kullanici Registration butonuna tiklar..................................passed Then kullanici "Thank you to join our team. You are Registered Successfully." masajini gormelidir.passed
